asChild.description: Merges its props onto its immediate child.
Merges its props onto its immediate child.

index.description: The index of the accordion item.

disabled.description: If `true`, the accordion item will be disabled.

asChild.description: Merges its props onto its immediate child.

animationOpacity.description: If `true`, the opacity of the content will be animated.

endingHeight.description: The height you want the content in its expanded state.

open.description: Show the component. triggers when enter or exit states.

startingHeight.description: The height you want the content in its collapsed state.

unmountOnExit.description: If `true`, the element will unmount when `open={false}` and animation is done.

asChild.description: Merges its props onto its immediate child.

defaultIndex.description: The initial index(es) of the accordion item to expand.

icon.description: The accordion icon for all items to use.

iconHidden.description: If `true`, hide the accordion icon for all items.

index.description: The index(es) of the accordion item to expand.

items.description: If provided, generate elements based on items.

multiple.description: If `true`, multiple accordion items can be expanded at once.

onChange.description: The callback invoked when accordion items are expanded or collapsed.

toggle.description: If `true`, any expanded accordion item can be collapsed again.
